translations: adj.通行的，公认的；拉丁文圣经的
n.拉丁文圣经；公认的文本；（正式）俗语，口语

phrs.translation: 一种被称作通俗拉丁语
亚瑟王传奇拉丁文通俗本系列

sentences.sentence: This was probably first done by the Greek translators of the book, whom the Vulgate follows.
sentences.translation: 这可能是第一次做的希腊翻译的书籍，其中的武加大如下。

sentences.sentence: But though this view may find some support in the Vulgate (ii, 29), it is hardly countenanced by the Greek text.
sentences.translation: 但是，尽管这种看法可能会发现一些支持武加大(二29)，这是难以赞同由希腊文字。

sentences.sentence: The engineering gross contracts and the engineering item that is the engineering item management way of nations vulgate.
sentences.translation: 工程总承包和工程项目管理是国际通行的工程项目组织实施方式。
